summary: This program allow you to export skeleton from NIF to TXT file and then import it to Blender 2.65+
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=4][u][b]Description:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
This program allow you to export skeleton from NIF to TXT file and then import it to Blender 2.65+

[color=yellow][size=4][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
- allow to make unique animation
- allow to make custom skeleton (for "Body Animator" only)

[color=#00ffff]Instruction with an example of usage are located inside the archive.[/color]

[color=yellow][size=4][u][b]Issues:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
(none found, ... yet :))

[color=yellow][size=4][u][b]License:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
Don't modify or re-upload this tool without my permission.

[color=yellow][size=4][u][b]Credits:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
NifSkope team for NifSkope
Microsoft for Visual Studio 2010 Express
Bethesda for the Game
author: Anton
